attributes.action: Bring forward the Independent Public Enquiry into Govt handling of Coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: In 168 weeks, 152,068 citizens have died, and all citizen lives have been significantly disrupted. The Govt have made many errors with poor judgement, that has caused serious consequences. There has been unnecessary life lost, and measurable harm has been done in ways to us all. In memory, and with dignity towards the deceased, their families and all lives affected. We the people, demand that our Govt - whom we fund and appoint - bring forward and cooperate fully with an immediate investigation.
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has stated that the Independent Enquiry into his Governments handling of the Corona Virus crisis is going to be held before end of this session, likely to be in a years time. We the UK public demand that an Enquiry begin with immediate effect to ensure justice for the deceased.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Start the independent inquiry on UK Government decisions during Covid pandemic.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587338
